name: Target Practice (Oculus Quest on Windows)
description:
Disclaimer: Only for Oculus Quest VR using official link cable to Windows computer, will not work if you attempt to play on computer without Oculus Quest headset.

Game Type/Genre: VR, fast-paced throwing game

Description: Race against time to break as many targets as possible and beat your high score

Instructions: 

Device Requirements: Windows computer, High power GPU, Oculus app, account, and link cable, any Oculus headset with touch controllers (Rift S, Quest, Quest 2)

Link and play on headset: Connect the link cable to both your computer and the headset. Once your computer and the Oculus app finds your headset, put on the headset and allow your computer to access your headset’s data. Then, in the headset, navigate to Oculus link. Once you see the Oculus Rift home, start the game and you will automatically appear in the game. Gameplay: Structured with first a tutorial level and then the actual game. Press a red button on the table to start and spawn a blue ball. To press the button, physically move your controller to press it like you would a real button. Grab the ball like you naturally would with the grab trigger (middle finger). Release your grip while swinging your arm to throw the ball.
